segments.text: I want to know how to buy something from this machine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , the new ones can be tricky . What are you trying to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy one of those snack things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The money goes in the slot over there . It has to be smooth to go in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just remember that you might have to feed the money in a couple of times to get it to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Make your selection and hope for the best . Vending machines aren't all that reliable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You seem to have it down . Have a good day !
segments.speaker: S2
